title: Cook Your Catch
sitename: Cook Your Catch | Discover Crystal River
cleaned_text: 13982 W Ozello Trail Ozello, 34429 It's a time honored Florida tradition: seaside [restaurants](https://www.discovercrystalriverfl.com/dining/) that will Cook Your Catch after a long day on the water. All you need to do is bring your cleaned scallops or [fish](https://www.discovercrystalriverfl.com/things-to-do/on-water/fishing/) with you and leave the rest up to our expert Chefs for a tantalizing mouth-watering meal. Traditional meals include your catch and all the "fixins" for a complete meal which can even be served family style. Call ahead or let your host know you'd like Cook Your Catch at the following restaurants then relax and enjoy.
